column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Monica - Thank you for your review. I will speak to our back of house about your review. When it comes to working in a high-volume
column3: it's very easy for staff to transfer their stress and anxiety to physical tasks such as wiping the plates dry
column4: or drying off the spoons that come out of the dishwasher. We appreciate your bringing this to our attention.
